overview: Destroyed during a fire that ravaged Sampaguita’s archives. Gilda tells the story of a poor squatter who carried her invalid mother while begging on the streets for money. As she lives under the abusive hand of her mother’s lover, Gilda dreams of becoming a singer.
tagline: HER OBSESSION WAS POWER AND REVENGE - DID IT BRING FULFILLMENT OR FRUSTRATION? SEE! THE SCREEN’S MOST TALKED-ABOUT DRAMATIC ACTRESS -  OPPOSITE SAMPAGUITA’S 1ST STAR OR 1956 !
title: Gilda
